description.brief: Rock components needed for the rock-gazebo bridge

package.description: This oroGen project defines components that are needed for the rock-gazebo bridge. They are not meant to be used standalone: the simulation/rock_gazebo package uses them to expose gazebo simulations to a Rock system
package.author: Thomio Watanabe/thomio.watanabe@fieb.org.br
